mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.wo_code, p.employee_id, p.line_code, p.item_code, p.sQTY, p.pQTY, p.item_name, ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(pfQTY), 0) FROM prod_perf_add WHERE perf_gobd = 'y' AND wo_code = p.wo_code ) + COALESCE(ir.total_error_QTY, 0) as total_error_QTY, p.line_name FROM prod p LEFT OUTER JOIN prod_perf_add pa ON pa.wo_code = p.wo_code LEFT OUTER JOIN items_error_rate ir ON ir.item_code = pa.item_code Limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT DISTINCT p.wo_code, p.employee_id, p.line_code, p.item_code, p.sQTY, p.pQTY, p.item_name, ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(pfQTY), 0) FROM prod_perf_add WHERE perf_gobd = 'y' AND wo_code = p.wo_code ) + COALESCE(ir.total_error_QTY, 0) as total_error_QTY, p.line_name FROM prod p LEFT OUTER JOIN prod_perf_add pa ON pa.wo_code = p.wo_code LEFT OUTER JOIN items_error_rate ir ON ir.item_code = pa.item_code WHERE p.wo_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{wo_code}, '%') AND p.line_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{line_code}, '%') AND p.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{item_name}, '%') AND p.employee_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{employee_id}, '%') LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM prod
where wo_code like concat('%', #{wo_code}, '%') and line_code like concat('%', #{line_code}, '%') and employee_id like concat('%', #{employee_id}, '%') and item_name like concat('%', #{item_name}, '%')

SELECT ppa.item_code, SUM(ppa.pfQTY) AS total_QTY, SUM(CASE WHEN ppa.perf_gobd = 'Y' THEN ppa.pfQTY ELSE 0 END) AS total_error_QTY, ie.error_status FROM prod p LEFT OUTER JOIN prod_perf_add ppa ON p.wo_code = ppa.wo_code LEFT OUTER JOIN items_error_rate ie ON ie.item_code = ppa.item_code WHERE ppa.item_code IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ppa.item_code, ie.error_status ORDER BY ppa.item_code asc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO items_error_rate (item_code, error_status) SELECT p.item_code, #{error_status} FROM prod p LEFT OUTER JOIN prod_perf_add ppa ON p.wo_code = ppa.wo_code LEFT OUTER JOIN items_error_rate ie ON ie.item_code = p.item_code AND ie.wo_code = p.wo_code where p.item_code = #{item_code} GROUP BY p.item_code, p.pQTY
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT ppa.item_code, SUM(ppa.pfQTY) AS total_QTY, SUM(CASE WHEN ppa.perf_gobd = 'Y' THEN ppa.pfQTY ELSE 0 END) AS total_error_QTY, ie.error_status FROM prod p LEFT OUTER JOIN prod_perf_add ppa ON p.wo_code = ppa.wo_code LEFT OUTER JOIN items_error_rate ie ON ie.item_code = ppa.item_code WHERE ppa.item_code IS NOT NULL
AND ppa.item_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{item_code}, '%')
AND ie.error_status LIKE CONCAT('%', #{error_status}, '%')
GROUP BY ppa.item_code, ie.error_status ) AS subquery
